communities.name: Five Points Project
communities.description: Five Points is bringing live music back to London, providing accessible music events in unique spaces to help combat isolation and loneliness.

communities.name: Walk This Way
communities.description: A hiking community with hikes starting in London and travelling across the UK, aimed at building friendships and opening the outdoors for all.

communities.name: Knight Chess Club
communities.description: Outdoor chess club that allows strangers to connect over shared moments of the game, filling up venues across London.
